column4: Got an issue I'm hoping someone can help with.. when I run the following command...

...it works just fine when I run from terminal, but when I assign it to <SUPER>F12 with gconf-editor, nothing happens when I press <SUPER>F12 (but when <SUPER>F12 is assigned to something like firefox it works just fine)
you may put the command in a script and run it instead
